titles.title: Foreign-Free Elections Act
To amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to prohibit the participation of foreign entities in the administration of elections for Federal office.
Foreign-Free Elections Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Foreign-Free Elections Act
This bill prohibits foreign entities from administering federal elections.
Specifically, each state must ensure that no foreign entity carries out the administration of federal elections, including maintaining or operating equipment or software.
Additionally, the bill prohibits a nonprofit organization from carrying out activities related to voting or elections for state public office if the organization accepts funds from a foreign entity.
